messages.message:
Hi team,

One of my PRs (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71384) is currently failing on the `make-sandbox` step with the message of

```Setting up org:
Error: An org with this name (cypress-org-ds-71384) already exists Trace ID: 1e2d2ac1eaa7144e
Error creating org cypress-org-ds-71384 with owner <mailto:cypress-org-admin-data-sources-71384@instabase.com|cypress-org-admin-data-sources-71384@instabase.com> Error: An org with this name (cypress-org-ds-71384) already exists```
Has anyone else encountered this issue with cypress before?
@Xindi Xu do we delete and re-create orgs on every Cypress CI run? if so, maybe the delete step didn't work?
Thanks for the ping! No, we don't delete and re-create orgs on every Cypress CI run.

Seems like a similar issue with https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1750798215462209
It doesn't work because the PR was created before the perms v2 migration

should we just delete the crafting sandbox and have the CI pipeline create a new sandbox?

this way, everything in the new sandbox will start out using the perms v2 logic

We'll have to delete the ICC sandbox because that's where the DB is stored. Essentially, the user was added to the org in ACL system, but the permissions wasn't migrated over. Then, it tries to create org with the same name, so it failed
I manually added the user to the org
ok then we should try re-running Cypress CI then?
I ran the script locally and it passed.
Yes, we can rerun the Cypress CI!

Sorry! Yesterday, I tried to fix all 3 orgs created in this PR, but CPS keeps on crashing. My request to add the user to the last org `cypress-org-ds-71384` probably didn't go through... And I didn't verify :sweat:
no worries, thanks for helping out with this PR's CI!! :raised_hands:
Sorry I was out getting lunch, but wow thank you so much for all your help @Xindi Xu!
